full_title: Luv Bad Bitches by Future, Metro Boomin & Brownstone
title: Luv Bad Bitches

description.plain: Metro impresses with a muffled beat built around sampling Brownstone’s Grammy-nominated “If You Love Me.” Future flips his appreciation for good girls but love for “bad b—–s” into a catchy chorus. He gets back to his toxic romantic ways. “Let’s gеt so drunk we forget to f–k/ I need an excusе to wake up next to you/ Let’s do some X so we can feel in love,” Future suggests.

embed_content: Read “Luv Bad Bitches” by Future, Metro Boomin & Brownstone on Genius
